Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
Evidence Statements: The student can show in their drawing how plants look when they have enough water.
The student can show in their drawing how plants look when they do not have enough water.
The student can show in their drawing how plants look when they have enough light.
The student can show in their drawing how plants look when they do not have enough light.
The student can identify patterns in their drawings that illustrate that plants need both water and light to live and grow.
